945820.name: Spotter
945820.description:
Embark on an exhilarating adventure with Spotter, a thrilling game that will test your observation skills in a mysterious room. As you explore the surroundings, your task is to uncover a series of hidden objects within a limited time frame. Brace yourself for an immersive experience filled with excitement and suspense as you navigate through the room, careful to avoid any eerie encounters that may send shivers down your spine.

In this captivating treasure hunt-themed game, unravel the secrets of the room by finding ways to illuminate your surroundings. Utilize the flare gun strategically to aid you in locating the most challenging objects. Time is of the essence, so plan your moves wisely to complete the adventure before the clock runs out. Compare your score with players from around the world on baKno's Top Players list and prove your prowess as a skilled Spotter. Get ready for an unforgettable journey filled with hidden surprises and a race against time.
945820.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
